description: This file is a React functional component representing a login screen with form inputs for email, password, role, a 'Remember me' checkbox, and navigation to other pages. It handles user input and submission, styled with inline CSS.

methods.name: LoginScreen
methods.description: Functional React component rendering a login form with role selection and navigation.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles form submission by preventing default and navigating to '/select-species'.
